Shop Now Power Clean, Every Time: Discover Anupam Shakti
and Anupam Gold

AnuShakti Matic Liquid | 1 Liter

Extra power for a deep clean – removes stains and keeps fabrics soft, all in one wash.

Powerful Stain Removal

Say goodbye to tough stains in one wash!

Safe for All Machines

Designed for top-load and front-load washing machines alike.

Gentle on Fabrics

Keeps your clothes soft and vibrant after every wash.

Quick Dissolve Formula

Effortlessly dissolves in water without leaving any residue.

Long-Lasting Freshness

Infused with a refreshing fragrance that stays with your clothes.

Eco-Friendly Formula

Carefully formulated to be gentle on the environment.

Choose from Our Product Range....

Discover the Perfect Solution for Every Laundry Need – From Tough Stains to Delicate Fabrics, We’ve Got You Covered!

Why People Love Anupam?

Getting Better All The Time

Mujhe toh Anupam ka detergent bahut hi accha lagta hai! Mere kapde hamesha bright aur fresh rehte hain. Stains bhi easily nikal jaate hain. Truly value for money!

 Ravi Sharma
Fresh New Femite To Be!

Anupam Gold detergent se kapdon ka rang bilkul fade nahi hota. Aur fragrance bhi itni acchi hoti hai ki poora din fresh feel hota hai. Ab toh yeh mera favorite ban gaya hai!

 Priya Mehta
Getting Better All The Time

Anupam Shakti matic liquid ka result ekdum zabardast hai! Ek hi wash mein tough stains nikal gaye aur kapde soft bhi rahe. Har baar best result milta hai!

 Rahul Verma
The Features Are The Best!

Mere ghar mein sab sirf Anupam ka detergent hi use karte hain. Stains easily remove ho jaate hain aur kapde bilkul naye jaise lagte hain. Bahut hi accha product hai!

 Sneha Gupta
Getting Better All The Time

With Anupam Gold detergent, the color of my clothes never fades. The fragrance is so nice that I feel fresh all day. It has become my favorite now!

 geeta singh
